coza.opencollab.synthesis.service.api.content

Interface ContentLoader


  • public interface ContentLoader
    The implementations must load module content in the Synthesis service.

    This may be a ongoing task, so content will have to be loaded periodically.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    OpenCollab

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getNonExistingVersion()
      The default non existing version.
      SynchContent getSynchContent(String moduleId, String toolName, String fromContentVersion, String toContentVersion)
      Retrieves the synch content for the tool.
      SynchContent getUserContent(String username, String moduleId, String toolName, String fromContentVersion)
      Retrieves the synch content for the user on this tool.
      void load(String moduleId)
      Load the module to the content management.
      SynchContent merge(SynchContent contentA, SynchContent contentB)
      Merge two contents together.
      boolean silentlyUpdateNonExistingVersions()
      Whether to update non existing version to the current version without throwing an exception.
      Map<String,?> updateUserContent(String username, String moduleId, String toolName, Map<String,?> content, String originalContent)
      Updates the user content on the lms.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(String moduleId)
        Load the module to the content management.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - The module id.

      • silentlyUpdateNonExistingVersions

        boolean silentlyUpdateNonExistingVersions()
        Whether to update non existing version to the current version without throwing an exception.
        Returns:
        a boolean.

      • getNonExistingVersion

        String getNonExistingVersion()
        The default non existing version.
        Returns:
        a String object.

      • getSynchContent

        SynchContent getSynchContent(String moduleId,
                           String toolName,
                           String fromContentVersion,
                           String toContentVersion)
        Retrieves the synch content for the tool. This is content that is valid for all users.
        Parameters:
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        fromContentVersion - The version before the synch package start.
        toContentVersion - The end version.
        Returns:
        The synch package.

      • getUserContent

        SynchContent getUserContent(String username,
                          String moduleId,
                          String toolName,
                          String fromContentVersion)
        Retrieves the synch content for the user on this tool. This is content that is valid for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        fromContentVersion - The version before the synch package start.
        Returns:
        The synch package.

      • updateUserContent

        Map<String,?> updateUserContent(String username,
                              String moduleId,
                              String toolName,
                              Map<String,?> content,
                              String originalContent)
        Updates the user content on the lms.
        Parameters:
        username - The username.
        moduleId - The module id.
        toolName - The tool name.
        content - The data to send to the lms.
        originalContent - a String object.
        Returns:
        Any response from the lms.

      • merge

        SynchContent merge(SynchContent contentA,
                 SynchContent contentB)
        Merge two contents together. These must be valid contents.
        Parameters:
        contentA - a SynchContent object.
        contentB - a SynchContent object.
        Returns:
        The merged content.
